scripts.init: npm ci && cd apps/frontend && npm ci && cd ../../apps/action-server && npm ci
scripts.dev:train: docker compose build apps/rasa && docker compose up
scripts.dev:mac: concurrently --names "apps/frontend,apps/action-server,apps/rasa" -c "auto" "cd apps/frontend && npm run dev" "cd apps/action-server && npm run dev" "cd apps/rasa && rasa run --enable-api --cors "*""
